item.title: How to get into a large codebase
item.description: A while back, somebody asked on the ExperiencedDevs subreddit about how to work with a large codebase. I wanted to expand on the answer I gave there as I think it’s an interesting topic. Setting the stage In one of my previous roles, I took over an almost disintegrated development department. There were only two junior developers left, the company had experienced what a bus factor of one means and had lost their principal developer to an illness.
